member.name: T:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice
member.summary:
Shaker device
The Shaker device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one sias shaker module on a sias instrument.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_Shaker
The interface includes - configuration properties for default speed, default ramp and default shake mode - layout properties for the shaker slots - properties reflecting shaker speeds and times - methods for starting and stopping the shaker .
%SShakerDevice class diagram
\image html "SShakerDevice.png"

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.#ctor(System.Int16,System.Int16,System.UInt16,Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.ShakeMode,System.Int16)
member.summary: Manual generation constructor. This constructor creates a device by using the given parameters.
member.param: Maximum number of slots for this shaker

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.HandleModuleError(System.Boolean,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SShaker devices
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x0040 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_SHAKER") . Handled errors: - none .
member.param: true if force error handling, false if not

member.summary: Internal access modes for the shake positions

member.summary: Shake timer field

member.name: F:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice._RemainingShakeTime
member.summary:
Remaining shake time field
This field keeps the remaining shake time if a shaking was interrupted.

member.name: F:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice._TargetSpeed
member.summary: Target speed field of last/actual shake command

member.name: F:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice._TargetRamp
member.summary: Target ramp field of last/actual shake command

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.GetSlotIndex(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the index of the object if found in the shakers slot list or -1 if not.
member.returns: index of the object, -1 if not found

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.StartTimeMove(System.UInt16,Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.ShakeMode,System.Int16,System.UInt16)
member.summary:
Start shake command.
This command starts the shaker for a given time.

member.name: F:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.ActualLayoutDevice
member.summary: Actual layout device. E.g. for sending the display state to layout

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this will succeed it returns true. If it fails it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: true if attachable, false if not

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.GetAccessMode(System.Object)
member.summary:
Get Access mode.
This Method is used to request the actual access mode.
member.returns: Access mode for the given caller object

member.name: M:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.SetAccessMode(System.Object,Sias.Core.Interfaces.SAccessMode,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set access mode.
This method prepares the shaker module to allow the requested access.
member.remarks: Remarks: - If the timeout is longer than the remaining shaker time the function will not wait for the finished timeout. It will return inaccessible immediately

member.name: T:Sias.Shaker.SShakerDevice.ErrorCodes
member.summary:
This static class keeps the error code constants of the \ref Sias::Shaker::SShakerDevice errors.
Actually there are no shaker device errors
